thread.title: Paris and Los Angeles tussle for 2024 Olympics after Budapest’s withdrawal | Sport | The Guardian
thread.title_full: Paris and Los Angeles tussle for 2024 Olympics after Budapest’s withdrawal | Sport | The Guardian

author: Associated Press
title: Paris and Los Angeles tussle for 2024 Olympics after Budapest’s withdrawal | Sport | The Guardian
text:
Paris and Los Angeles tussle for 2024 Olympics after Budapest’s withdrawal • Hungarian government spokesman confirms bid is now over • Paris attempting to host Games for first time in a century Budapest is set to withdraw from the race to host the Olympic Games in 2024 Photograph: Laszlo Balogh/Reuters View more sharing options Wednesday 22 February 2017 19.48 GMT Last modified on Wednesday 22 February 2017 19.52 GMT 
Budapest’s bid to host the 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games has been withdrawn, according to a government spokesman. Sports are cut adrift in the drive for British Olympic medals | Sean Ingle Read more 
Zoltan Kovacs said the decision had been made following a meeting on Wednesday between prime minister Viktor Orban, the city’s Mayor Istvan Tarlos and the Hungarian Olympic Committee (MOB). 
It means only Paris and Los Angeles remain in the race to host the Games. 
More to follow...
